parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.16

</value></part><part><name>serverExec</name>=<value> server

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Curator

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Allow curator use of given addon.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> curatorObj '''addCuratorAddons''' addons

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> curatorObj: [[Object]] - Curator module.

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> addons: [[Array]] of CfgPatches classes

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>curatorObj [[addCuratorAddons]] ["A3_Armor_F_AMV","A3_Armor_F_Panther"];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>curatorObj [[addCuratorAddons]] ["A3_Modules_F_Curator_Lightning"];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> Addons can be stacked:<code>curatorObj [[addCuratorAddons]] ["A3_Armor_F_AMV","A3_Armor_F_Panther"];
curatorObj [[addCuratorAddons]] ["A3_Modules_F_Curator_Lightning"];
[[diag_log]] [[curatorAddons]] curatorObj;</code>
<br>
<code>[
	"A3_Armor_F_AMV",
	"A3_Armor_F_Panther",
	"A3_Modules_F_Curator_Lightning"
]</code>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[Arma 3: Curator]], [[removeCuratorAddons]], [[removeAllCuratorAddons]], [[curatorAddons]]

</value></part><part><name>mp</name>=<value> Can be executed only on server
</value></part></template></root>
